content: at the top you should have 2 completed scales in this row 5 completed scales in total 5 chain 3 counts as your first double_crochet work another dcs between the skipped 2 dcs of the last row *chain 2 work 2 double_crochet in to the center of the next scale chain 2 work 2 dcs between the skipped 2 dcs of the last set of double_crochet * repeat from * to * one more time you should have 5 sets of 2 dcs 6 repeat row 2 should measure 3 inches tall and 5 5 inches wide pattern chain 9 1 double_crochet into the third chain from the hook *chain 2 and skip 2 chains work 2 dcs in the next chain * repeat from * to * once more you should have 3 sets of 2 dcs 2 in this step you will work the dragon scales stitch around the double_crochet posts from row 1 turn the foundation row so that the top is now on your right chain 1 skip the first set of double_crochet posts work five dcs around the first post of the second set of dcs chain 1 now turn the foundation row so that the top is on your left work five dcs around the second post of this set of dcs chain 1 turn the foundation row so that the top is back at the top slip_stitch between the 2 dcs of the last set of dcs you should have 1 completed scale 3 chain 3 counts as first double_crochet double_crochet between the 2 posts of the last set of dcs where you just slip_stitch in the last row chain 2 work 2 dcs into the center of the scale chain 2 work 2 dcs between the 2 posts of the last set of double_crochet you should have 3 sets of 2 dcs 4 turn the foundation row so that the top is now on your right chain 3 counts as first double_crochet work 4 dcs around the first post of the foundation row now turn the foundation row so that the top is on your left chain 1 work 5 dcs around the second post of the foundation row chain 1 turn the foundation row once again so that the top is now on your right skip the next set of dcs work 5 dcs around the first post of the next set of dcs chain 1 now turn the foundation row so that the top is on your left work 5 dcs on the second post of this set of dcs turn the foundation row so that the top is back at the top you should have 2 completed scales 5 chain 3 counts as first double_crochet double_crochet into the same stitch top of the last double_crochet you made in the previous row chain 2 work 2 dcs into the center of the next scale chain 2 double_crochet between the 2 posts of the next set of dcs chain 2 work
